do_if.value: this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_l, class.ship_xl] and this.assignedcontrolled.shieldpercentage lt 25 and this.assignedcontrolled.hullpercentage lt 50

set_value.name: this.$kAAIT_data.$combatRange_min
this.$kAAIT_data.$isTargetHighRisk
this.$kAAIT_data.$isTargetPotentialHighRisk
set_value.exact: this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget.isclass.station or this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget.size gt this.assignedcontrolled.size * 1.5 or this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget.dps.all gt this.assignedcontrolled.dps.all * 1.25

do_if.value: this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_xs, class.ship_s, class.ship_m] or ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_l, class.ship_xl] and this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose != purpose.fight )

debug_text.text: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' high-risk target or ship is not a fighter. avoid if near target.'
this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' CHECK AHEAD FOR BIG ENEMIES'

do_if.value: this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_l, class.ship_xl] and this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose == purpose.fight and this.assignedcontrolled.orders.{1}.id == 'Attack' and $kAAIT_bigEnemy == this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget
do_if.comment: only LXL are allowed to engage their target even if the target is high-risk or a potential high-risk
